text: Leicy María Santos Herrera (born 16 May 1996) is a Colombian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Spanish Primera División club Atlético Madrid and the Colombia women's national team. She was national champion with Iowa Central Community College. ==References== == External links == * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:Colombian women's footballers Category:People from Córdoba Department Category:Colombia women's international footballers Category:2015 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:Olympic footballers of Colombia Category:Footballers at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Colombia Category:Pan American Games medalists in football Category:Footballers at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Footballers at the 2015 Pan American Games Category:College women's soccer players in the United States Category:Iowa Central Community College alumni Category:Primera División (women) players Category:Atlético Madrid Femenino players Category:Colombian expatriate women's footballers Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:Expatriate women's soccer players in the United States Category:Expatriate women's footballers in Spain Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Spain
title: Leicy Santos
